select fct.food_comment_id, fct.food_id, fct.user_id, fct.content, fct.created_at,
ut.user_id as ut_user_id, ut.username, ut.password, ut.name, ut.email, ut.profile_img_path, ut.role, ut.provider, ut.provider_id, ut.created_at as ut_created_at,
fcit.food_comment_img_id, fcit.food_comment_id as fcit_food_comment_id, fcit.seq, fcit.`img_path`,
ifnull(fcil.is_like, 0) as is_like, ifnull(fclc.like_count, 0) as like_count from food_comment_tb fct left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = fct.user_id) left outer join food_comment_img_tb fcit on(fcit.food_comment_id = fct.food_comment_id) left outer join (select distinct food_comment_id, 1 as is_like from food_comment_like_tb where user_id = #{userId}) fcil on(fcil.food_comment_id = fct.food_comment_id) left outer join (select food_comment_id, count(*) as like_count from food_comment_like_tb group by food_comment_id) fclc on(fclc.food_comment_id = fct.food_comment_id) where fct.food_id = #{foodId} order by like_count desc, fct.food_comment_id desc
select count(*) from food_comment_tb where food_id = #{foodId}
